docs.snippet: The social network includes an option in the settings for displaying nicer-looking versions of the pictures you upload from your phone.

headline.main: Get Your Photos Looking Better on Facebook

docs.abstract: Tech Tip Q&A; ways to display better quality photos on Facebook highlighted.

docs.snippet: A daylong stream will feature the 11 arts organizations that are based there.

headline.print_headline: A Day at Lincoln Center, Live on Facebook
headline.main: Facebook Live: ‘A Day in the Life at Lincoln Center’

docs.abstract: Lincoln Center will live stream on Facebook day of work for 11 arts organizations based there as part of event A Day in the Life at Lincoln Center; event is latest attempt by arts group to harness power of social media to connect with audiences.

docs.snippet: A Hamburg regulator said on Tuesday that neither the messenger nor its parent company had received individuals’ permission to share digital information.

headline.print_headline: German Regulator Orders Facebook to Stop Collecting Data on WhatsApp Users
headline.main: Facebook Ordered to Stop Collecting Data on WhatsApp Users in Germany

docs.abstract: Hamburg's data protection commissioner orders Facebook to cease collecting and storing data on WhatsApp users in Germany.

docs.snippet: Beginning this weekend, some Facebook users in the United States will be able to buy tickets without leaving their news feeds.

headline.print_headline: Buy Movie Tickets on Facebook? Fandango Will Make It Possible
headline.main: Buy Movie Tickets on Facebook? Fandango Makes It Possible

docs.snippet: Facebook Inc said users in the United States would be able to order food through the Facebook pages of restaurants starting on Wednesday as part of its efforts to connect users and businesses.
The orchestra’s opening night, which includes Dvorak’s Symphony No. 9, will also kick off an initiative to get the whole city on the same note.

headline.print_headline: Live, on Facebook: New York Philharmonic
headline.main: A Facebook First for New York Philharmonic: Streaming Its 175th Anniversary Opener

docs.snippet: The social network was criticized for removing the image of a naked girl fleeing napalm, renewing questions about the company’s role in what can be published online.

headline.main: Facebook Restores Iconic Vietnam War Photo It Censored for Nudity

docs.snippet: Facebook Live makes it easy to stream real-time video from your mobile device to everybody in your world — or the world at large.
docs.abstract: Tech Tip Q&A; advice offered on making live video on Facebook with its Facebook Live feature.

docs.snippet: Take these steps to discover how the social network categorizes your political leanings.

headline.print_headline: Which Way  Do You Vote? Facebook  Has an Idea
headline.main: Liberal, Moderate or Conservative? See How Facebook Labels You

docs.abstract: Facebook's traffic analysis tools can determine users' political views even when they are not clearly stated; many political campaigns are taking advantage of algorithm, paying Facebook to target particular audiences for political advertisements.

docs.snippet: The mobile messaging service, which Facebook bought in 2014, says it will disclose users’ phone numbers and analytics data.

headline.print_headline: WhatsApp to Provide User Data to Facebook
headline.main: Relaxing Privacy Vow, WhatsApp Will Share Some Data With Facebook

docs.abstract: WhatsApp announces plan to begin disclosing phone numbers and analytics data of its more than 1 billion users to Facebook; start-up plans to let businesses contact customers directly through its platform.
